results.content:
Was a good initial primer to html and css for someone who needed a current explanation of web Dev. Class would be good for a younger person and or newbie to how a website is created.

Overall not a bad class.
results.content_html:
Was a good initial primer to html and css for someone who needed a current explanation of web Dev. Class would be good for a younger person and or newbie to how a website is created.

results.content: This course seems like it is just general rambling by the instructor.  It is a huge contrast to the classes that instructors spend hours outlining their content and rehearse.  This guy is talking about how his phone is ringing and how he just ate and lots of stuff that just makes the class very unprofessional.
results.content_html: This course seems like it is just general rambling by the instructor. It is a huge contrast to the classes that instructors spend hours outlining their content and rehearse. This guy is talking about how his phone is ringing and how he just ate and lots of stuff that just makes the class very unprofessional.

results.content: There is a lot of information and it's presented in a clear (mostly) manner by a teenager who is enthusiastic to teach the content - I really like that. Great course to start with if you've never had anything to do with HTML. As for other things - there is frequent (but very short) rambling and the course seems unfinished as in lesson 46 Caleb is talking about 'next video' but lesson 46 is in fact the last video (plus the audio is terrible - distracting gym noise). Still, in 46 lessons you're going to learn a lot of HTML and it's all for free so... thanks Caleb!
results.content_html: There is a lot of information and it's presented in a clear (mostly) manner by a teenager who is enthusiastic to teach the content - I really like that. Great course to start with if you've never had anything to do with HTML. As for other things - there is frequent (but very short) rambling and the course seems unfinished as in lesson 46 Caleb is talking about 'next video' but lesson 46 is in fact the last video (plus the audio is terrible - distracting gym noise). Still, in 46 lessons you're going to learn a lot of HTML and it's all for free so... thanks Caleb!

results.content: Great course but needs more structure and less jumping from one subject content to another.  Maybe a structured outline of what to be included in a presentation would help a beginner like me see the logical sequence of how subject content relates.  I am sure someone with a little more knowledge of the subject would easily give it a five star + rating
results.content_html: Great course but needs more structure and less jumping from one subject content to another. Maybe a structured outline of what to be included in a presentation would help a beginner like me see the logical sequence of how subject content relates. I am sure someone with a little more knowledge of the subject would easily give it a five star + rating

results.content: Perfect for beginners and really straightforward with the basics concepts and frequent tools used in web developing but not many explanations on why to use some resources and some mistakes in the way. I believe it will make sense when you combine it with other languages.

results.content: This course teaches basic HTML & CSS syntax and uses and it undoubtedly fulfilled this task; however, the content it covers is relatively shallow and, in some occasions, has not been accurately delivered. results.content_html: This course teaches basic HTML & CSS syntax and uses and it undoubtedly fulfilled this task; however, the content it covers is relatively shallow and, in some occasions, has not been accurately delivered. I am afraid that people who really want to study website design by reading online sites code cannot achieve their goal after finishing this course:(

Compared to the other classes on the same topic, this one was a little bit chaotic.

results.content: He has done a very good job with examples.  His pace on the course content is excellent for beginners and doesn't waste too much time with needless items.  Very clearly spoken and his examples are basic at directed towards the lessons. After lesson 20, he starts using Paint to demonstrate web development, which took away from the quality of training for me.
results.content_html: He has done a very good job with examples. His pace on the course content is excellent for beginners and doesn't waste too much time with needless items. Very clearly spoken and his examples are basic at directed towards the lessons. After lesson 20, he starts using Paint to demonstrate web development, which took away from the quality of training for me.
